archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0242
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to be able to link another product to my account, so that I can manage it all in one place.

properties.value: Is it realized through invitation process? its about buying new services under the same account or linking the services to the same account through invitation parked for Customer hierarchy session.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
